Room.Name: Limbo
Room.ShortDescription: This is limbo, a place you go when you die.
Room.LongDescription: Lost souls wander about aimlessly, hopelessly seeking to gain an insight into the meaning of their past lives. Adventurous souls who do not wish to return to Celduin to start their lives again should go through the blue door. &#Ð;&#º;&#Ð;&#¸;&#Ñ;&#€;&#Ð;&#¸;&#Ð;&#»;&#Ð;&#»;&#Ð;&#¸;&#Ñ;&#†;
